message.raw:
Created first pass at command line interface using `Click`.

currently the command `autoprocess` (run via `python cli.py autoprocess`) is the most complete, mimicing the `if __name__ == '__main__'` block of `autoscrub.py`.

TODO:
 * complete the other commands
 * allow reuse of options between commands so they are all easy to update in one go
 * Fix loudness-adjust command (it currently doesn't work well for large increases in volume). This may imply a misunderstanding of how LUFS and gain are related and we should investigate whether this effects the autoprocess command and whether it explains the increase in background hiss/hum we've sometimes noticed during sped-up portions of the processed video.
 * Create setup.py and restructure the package so it can be installed using pip and run as `autoscrub <command> ...`

message:
Created first pass at command line interface using `Click`.

currently the command `autoprocess` (run via `python cli.py autoprocess`) is the most complete, mimicing the `if __name__ == '__main__'` block of `autoscrub.py`.

TODO:
 * complete the other commands
 * allow reuse of options between commands so they are all easy to update in one go
 * Fix loudness-adjust command (it currently doesn't work well for large increases in volume). This may imply a misunderstanding of how LUFS and gain are related and we should investigate whether this effects the autoprocess command and whether it explains the increase in background hiss/hum we've sometimes noticed during sped-up portions of the processed video.
 * Create setup.py and restructure the package so it can be installed using pip and run as `autoscrub <command> ...`
